name: Clean Dodge
description: A well-timed evasive movement that completely avoids the attack. Low stamina cost but requires good prediction and positioning.

active.description: Executing dodge movement - character is evading

recovery.description: Regaining footing and balance after dodge

defensiveProperties.description: Completely evades attack if dodge is active during late Wind-up or pre-Impact phase

effectiveWindow.description: Most effective when initiated during attacker's Committed phase, before Impact

onSuccess.description: Successful dodge maintains combat initiative and can reposition character (future: movement mechanics)

onFailure.description: If dodge timing is wrong and Impact overlaps, defender takes full damage

metadata.notes: Efficient defense that preserves stamina. Requires good telegraph reading to time correctly. Unlike parry, doesn't enable counter but maintains better positioning.
